Class IconUtils

java.lang.Object
school.management.system.util.IconUtils
public final class IconUtils extends Object
Utility class for handling icons and images throughout the application. Provides centralized image loading, scaling, and conversion functionality.

    • getAppIcon

      public static ImageIcon getAppIcon()
      Gets the main application icon, loading it if necessary.
      Returns:
      the application icon as an ImageIcon

    • getProfilePicture

      public static ImageIcon getProfilePicture(byte[] imageData, int width, int height, boolean isStudent)
      Loads and scales a profile picture from byte array data. Falls back to placeholder if data is null or empty.
      Parameters:
      imageData - the raw image data
      width - desired width
      height - desired height
      isStudent - true if this is a student profile picture (for placeholder selection), false otherwise for teacher
      Returns:
      a scaled ImageIcon

    • loadScaledImage

      public static ImageIcon loadScaledImage(String path, int width, int height)
      Loads and scales an image from a file path.
      Parameters:
      path - the path to the image file
      width - desired width
      height - desired height
      Returns:
      a scaled ImageIcon

    • loadScaledImage

      public static ImageIcon loadScaledImage(Image image, int width, int height)
      Scales an existing Image.
      Parameters:
      image - the source Image
      width - desired width
      height - desired height
      Returns:
      a scaled ImageIcon

    • imageToDataUri

      public static String imageToDataUri(byte[] imageData)
      Converts an image to a data URI for embedding in HTML.
      Parameters:
      imageData - the raw image data
      Returns:
      a data URI string, or empty string if conversion fails

    • getImageFileUri

      public static String getImageFileUri(String filename)
      Gets a file URI for an image in the libs/img directory.
      Parameters:
      filename - the name of the image file
      Returns:
      the file URI as a string, or empty string if file doesn't exist

    • byteArrayToBufferedImage

      public static BufferedImage byteArrayToBufferedImage(byte[] imageData)
      Converts byte array image data to a BufferedImage.
      Parameters:
      imageData - the raw image data
      Returns:
      the BufferedImage, or null if conversion fails
